sentence.idiomatic: Xiao Wang is an awful writer.
He is very careless when he does his homework. He always makes small mistakes.
Don't be careless when you drive. It's easy to cause an accident.
Do you think Xiao Zhang is very careless?
Ms Li pays a lot of attention to her appearance.
The students should pay attention to the school's rules.
Mr. Wang always pays no attention to the road when he drives.
Xiao Li never received a ticket.
When he went to school yesterday, the sun had just risen.
Just now Xiao Wang said you're not feeling well. Is that true?
The traffic light just turned red now. You should stop the car.
You know, you are a really terrible driver. You always drive too fast and also very careless.
That’s not true. I’m a responsible driver. I really pay attention to traffic rules. I’ve never received a fine.
Nonsense! You got three tickets last year for speeding. You even got a ticket for running a red light.
That time, the light hadn’t really turned red. It had just turned yellow. The policeman made a mistake.
